data.name: Tonalli López
data.Profile: I am currently studying online at Platzi.com and have completed some software development courses. I use React.js as my main Frontend development library, I know a little bit about style preprocessors, the one I liked the most is SASS, I also use webpack to package some of my projects and I'm starting to learn GraphQL, as well as fundamentals of relational and non-relational databases to complement my knowledge; and for mobile development I am learning technologies / languages ​​such as Flutter, React Native, Dart, Kotlin and Java, I still don't know much about mobile development but every day I am learning something new.

certificate.description: A complete career to know the Frontend and its structure when creating a project from the layout to give the styles.

certificate.description: The fastest way to get to know React and its technologies to create complete projects, manage states and routes in a SPA.
certificate.name: Frontend con React.js

certificate.description: A complete race to learn how to use JavaScript in depth on both the Frontend and Backend sides.
certificate.name: JavaScript

Academic.description: Three intensive months to learn the MEARN stack.
Studies not completed at CECyT No.1

experience.company: Estancia infantil y jardín de niños Colibrí
experience.jobDescription: I teach kindergarteners how to use a computer at a very basic level, explain what it is for and what basic care should be given to a computer. Also to have hand-eye coordination and improve your motor skills when using a mouse.
